content:
_id is a token search parameter (because of the needed exact match) but the format which is expected for the token is not included in https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token
As i was asked today what shall be before and after the pipe for a _id search i suggest to add clarification to the expected format on the search page.

Isn't the paragraph in "3.1.1.4.1 Parameters for all resources" sufficient?
"Note that although the _id parameter has a type of token, because servers SHALL use exact match with it, there is no system for the _id parameter."
